author: Lauren Goode
title: Can a Wearable Detect Covid-19 Before Symptoms Appear?
description: Stanford researchers hope to find the answer, which could impact health care beyond the current pandemic.
content: The first thing you might notice about Michael Snyder is just how many gadgets he has strapped to his hands and wrists on any given dayan Apple Watch, a Fitbit, a Biostrap, an Oura ring. The second is his enthusiasm for such devices. For more than a decade, S… [+5201 chars]
